reviewText: Outside of lacking some special features, this Blu is great for collectors of Shaw Brothers or martial arts films. The picture and audio is solid and the packaging - with a slick slip cover - makes for a great release.
Top ten of the Shaw brothers!

This is one of my favorite movies of all time. The plot is simple and the fighting sequences are awesome. Chen Kuan-tai has that same poise and style as Bruce Lee. He steals the screen and makes you believe in what he's fighting for. Definitely worth a watch if you are looking for a solid kung fu movie to watch.
Great movie with a fantastic message!
